name: The Jumping Jouster
description:
Requires Google Chrome to play in the browser! Please note that I did not develop this with the intention of exporting to HTML5 for browser play, so consider trying the desktop version.

Scroll down to download the game for MacOS and/or Windows. The desktop experience is better. :) If you're on MacOS, after you drag the app out of the .dmg, right-click on it and select Open and MacOS will allow you to run it in spite of being from an unidentified developer.

This is a simple "endless jousting pole vaulter," based on a New Yorker cartoon by Seth Fleishman, made with the Godot game engine. Gameplay was inspired by QWOP.

If the game appears black, try a hard refresh by holding down Shift and clicking refresh.

Does not work in Firefox or Safari.

Note: The instructions mention holding Shift and pressing Tab to toggle Fullscreen mode. That does not work in the browser version of the game. The Quit button also does not work in the browser version of the game.
